name: Nihongo
description:
Nihongo is a typing game that was designed to help those learning the Japanese language learn and memorize the two Japanese phonetic alphabets: Hiragana, used for particles and "spelling" out Kanji; and Katakana, used for onomatopoeiae and foreign words.

The game features 3 difficulty settings and charts for each alphabet, as well as a rudimentary scoring system so you can track how far you get each time.
